error.apologize: We apologize for the inconvenience. Please try the following solutions to resolve the issue.
error.emailTemplate.description: I encountered the following error while using Claude Code History Viewer:
error.emailTemplate.placeholder: [Please paste the copied error information here]
error.emailTemplate.subject: [Claude Code History Viewer] Error Report: {{error}}
error.emailTemplate.whatWereDoing: - What were you doing when the error occurred?
error.reportDescription: If this error occurs repeatedly, please report it to the email below:
error.troubleshootingSteps.reportPersist: If the problem persists, copy the error information and report it to the developer
error.troubleshootingSteps.restart: Try completely closing and restarting the app
error.troubleshootingSteps.tryOtherProje: Try opening a different project to see if the issue persists
error.troubleshootingSteps.updateVersion: Ensure you have the latest version of Claude Code History Viewer installed
